javadoc: DomainObjectDBChangeSet extends DBChangeSet providing methods which facilitate transaction synchronization with the domain object's DBHandle.

methods.javadoc: Resets the change sets after a save.
methods.name: clearUndo
methods.comment: Resets the change sets after a save.

methods.javadoc: Undo the last change data transaction
methods.name: undo
methods.comment: Undo the last change data transaction

methods.javadoc: Redo the change data transaction associated the last Undo.
methods.name: redo
methods.comment: Redo the change data transaction associated the last Undo.

methods.javadoc:
Set the undo/redo stack depth
@param maxUndos the maximum numbder of undo
methods.name: setMaxUndos
endTransaction

params.name: commit
params.comment:
if true transaction data is committed, 
               otherwise transaction data is discarded

name: DomainObjectDBChangeSet
comment:
DomainObjectDBChangeSet extends DBChangeSet 
 providing methods which facilitate transaction synchronization with the domain object's DBHandle.
